languages.text: "Дом Орселлио крайне опечален {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}гибелью Теобальда Триждыпроходца Орселлио{/d} — тем более от рук самого Вольного Торговца! Прискорбно, что держатель{mf||ница} священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g} ослепил{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империум{/g} на один навигаторский глаз". {n}Регент кривится{/n} "Идем, дитя. Нам пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое".

traits.locale_text: "Дом Орселлио крайне опечален гибелью Теобальда Триждыпроходца Орселлио — тем более от рук самого Вольного Торговца! Прискорбно, что держатель{mf||ница} священного Патента ослепил{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империум{/g} на один навигаторский глаз". {n}Регент кривится{/n} "Идем, дитя. Нам пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "House Orsellio is deeply saddened by the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}passing of Theobald Thrice-Pioneer Orsellio{/d} — and at the hand of the Rogue Trader, no less! It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one Navigator's eye." {n}The regent grimaces.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."
languages.original_text: "Дом Орселлио крайне опечален {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}гибелью Теобальда Триждыпроходца Орселлио{/d} — тем более от рук самого Вольного Торговца! Прискорбно, что держатель{mf||ница} священного {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g} ослепил{mf||а} {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империум{/g} на один навигаторский глаз". {n}Регент кривится{/n} "Идем, дитя. Нам пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое".

traits.locale_text: "House Orsellio is deeply saddened by the passing of Theobald Thrice-Pioneer Orsellio — and at the hand of the Rogue Trader, no less! It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred Warrant chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one navigator's eye." {n}The regent scrunches his face.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we depart to your new home so we can finish what we started."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "House Orsellio is deeply saddened by the passing of Theobald Thrice-Pioneer Orsellio — and at the hand of the Rogue Trader, no less! It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred Warrant chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one navigator's eye." {n}The regent scrunches his face.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we depart to your new home so we can finish what we started."

It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one Navigator's eye." {n}The regent grimaces.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: "House Orsellio is deeply saddened by the passing of Theobald Thrice-Pioneer Orsellio — and at the hand of the Rogue Trader, no less! It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one Navigator's eye." {n}The regent grimaces.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “奥赛罗家族对{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}‘开拓者’西奥巴德·奥赛罗的离世{/d}深感悲痛。更糟糕的是，我们的家族成员正是死在了行商浪人的手上！神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}的持有者，最终却选择让{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}失去一颗导航者的眼睛，这真是太让人遗憾了。”{n}摄政王的脸抽搐着。{/n}“来吧，孩子，是时候动身去你的新家了。这样一来，我们来这里的目的，就可以实现了。”
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply saddened by the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}passing of Theobald Thrice-Pioneer Orsellio{/d} — and at the hand of the Rogue Trader, no less! It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one Navigator's eye." {n}The regent grimaces.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: “奥塞罗家族对‘开拓者’西奥巴德·奥塞罗的离世深感悲痛。更糟糕的是，我们的家族成员正是死在了行商浪人的手上！神圣{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}的持有者，最终却选择让{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}失去一颗导航者的眼睛，这真是太让人遗憾了。”{n}摄政王的脸抽搐着。{/n}“来吧，孩子，是时候动身去你的新家了。这样一来，我们来这里的目的，就可以实现了。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «La casa Orsellio se entristece por la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}muerte de Theobald Tres Veces Pionero Orsellio{/d}, ¡a manos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente! Es lamentable que {mf|el|la} titular de una sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} optara por privar al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} del ojo de uno de sus Navegantes». {n}El regente hace una mueca{/n}. «Ahora vamos, pequeña. Es hora de que vayamos a tu nueva casa para terminar lo que empezamos».
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply saddened by the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}passing of Theobald Thrice-Pioneer Orsellio{/d} — and at the hand of the Rogue Trader, no less! It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one Navigator's eye." {n}The regent grimaces.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: «La casa Orsellio se entristece por la muerte de Theobald Tres Veces Pionero Orsellio, ¡a manos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente! Es lamentable que {mf|el|la} titular de una sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g} optara por privar al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} del ojo de uno de sus Navegantes». {n}El regente hace una mueca.{/n} «Ahora vamos, pequeña. Es hora de que vayamos a tu nueva casa para terminar lo que empezamos».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家は、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}シオボールド・スライス＝パイオニア・オーセリオの死去{/d}に深い悲しみを感じている…しかも、それが自由開拓者の手によるものなどと！神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}の所有者が、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}から航宙士の眼を奪うことを選んだことは遺憾である」{n}摂政は苦笑する。{/n}「さあ来るのだ、我が子よ。そろそろ新たな家へ旅立つ時だ。始めたことを終わらせるのだ」
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply saddened by the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}passing of Theobald Thrice-Pioneer Orsellio{/d} — and at the hand of the Rogue Trader, no less! It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one Navigator's eye." {n}The regent grimaces.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家は、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}シオボールド・スライス＝パイオニア・オーセリオの死去{/d}に深い悲しみを感じている…しかも、それが自由開拓者の手によるものなどと！神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}の所有者が、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}から航宙士の眼を奪うことを選んだことは遺憾である」{n}摂政は苦笑する。{/n}「さあ来るのだ、我が子よ。そろそろ新たな家へ旅立つ時だ。始めたことを終わらせるのだ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Das Haus Orsellio ist in tiefer Trauer über das {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}Dahinscheiden von Theobald Dreifach-Pionier Orsellio{/d} – zumal durch die Hand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}! Es ist bedauerlich, dass {mf|der Inhaber|die Inhaberin} eines heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} es für nötig hielt, das {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} eines Navigatorauges zu berauben." {n}Der Regent verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Kommt nun, Kind, es ist Zeit für die Abreise in Eure neue Heimat, damit wir beenden können, was wir begonnen haben."
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply saddened by the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}passing of Theobald Thrice-Pioneer Orsellio{/d} — and at the hand of the Rogue Trader, no less! It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one Navigator's eye." {n}The regent grimaces.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: "Das Haus Orsellio ist in tiefer Trauer über das Dahinscheiden von Theobald Dreifach-Pionier Orsellio – zumal durch die Hand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}! Es ist bedauerlich, dass {mf|der Inhaber|die Inhaberin} eines heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefs{/g} es für nötig hielt, das {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} eines Navigatorauges zu berauben." {n}Der Regent verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Kommt nun, Kind, es ist Zeit für die Abreise in Eure neue Heimat, damit wir beenden können, was wir begonnen haben."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « La maison Orsellio a été bouleversée d'apprendre le {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}décès de Théobald Tri-Pionnier Orsellio{/d}. Qui plus est de la main {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! Il est fort regrettable que de {mf|le détenteur|la détentrice} d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} ait choisi de priver l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} de l'œil visé d'un navigateur. »{n}Une grimace vient brièvement tordre le visage du régent.{/n} « Et maintenant, mon enfant, venez. Il est temps de rejoindre votre nouveau foyer et de finir ce que nous avons commencé. »
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply saddened by the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}passing of Theobald Thrice-Pioneer Orsellio{/d} — and at the hand of the Rogue Trader, no less! It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one Navigator's eye." {n}The regent grimaces.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: « La maison Orsellio a été bouleversée d'apprendre le décès de Théobald Tri-Pionnier Orsellio. Qui plus est de la main {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! Il est fort regrettable que de {mf|le détenteur|la détentrice} d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g} ait choisi de priver l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} de l'œil visé d'un navigateur. »{n}Une grimace vient brièvement tordre le visage du régent.{/n} « Et maintenant, mon enfant, venez. Il est temps de rejoindre votre nouveau foyer et de finir ce que nous avons commencé. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}Büyük Öncü Theobald Orsellio'nun vefatı{/d} sebebiyle büyük üzüntü içinde. Üstelik Hür Tacir'in ellerinde can verdi! Bir kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} hamilinin, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'u{/g} bir Rotacı gözünden mahrum bırakması üzüntü verici." {n}Naip yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Gel çocuğum, yeni evine gitmemiz ve başladığımız şeyi bitirmemiz gerek."
languages.original_text: "House Orsellio is deeply saddened by the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Cassia_KilledBothNavis}passing of Theobald Thrice-Pioneer Orsellio{/d} — and at the hand of the Rogue Trader, no less! It is regrettable that the holder of a sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} chose to deprive the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} of one Navigator's eye." {n}The regent grimaces.{/n} "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started."

traits.locale_text: "Orsellio Hanesi, Büyük Öncü Theobald Orsellio'nun vefatı, Hür Tacir'in kendi elleriyle neden olduğu vefatı sebebiyle büyük üzüntü içinde! Bir kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} sahibinin, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'u Rotacılarının birinin gözünden mahrum bırakması üzüntü verici." {n}Naip yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Gel çocuğum, yeni evine gitmemiz ve başladığımız şeyi bitirmemiz gerek."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
